text: is a former Japanese football player. ==Playing career== Uchida was born in Nagasaki Prefecture on August 12, 1972. After graduating from Meiji University, he joined Nagoya Grampus Eight in 1995. On April 22, he debuted against Kashima Antlers.J.League However he could only play this match until 1996. In 1997, he moved to Cerezo Osaka. He played many matches as defensive midfielder.
